subject: Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Six identical oceangoing multihulls will leave July 7 from New York in a trans-Atlantic race to Brest, France, organizers of the Krys Ocean Race announced.
snippet: Six identical oceangoing multihulls will leave July 7 from New York in a trans-Atlantic race to Brest, France, organizers of the Krys Ocean Race announced.
